attributes.additional_details:
In the last 53 years, there's only been ONE calendar year where he's not managed a game.

His charm and enthusiasm for football has never gone away and it's only right that he's rewarded for his achievements.
attributes.background:
No one has managed more games in English professional football than Neil Warnock.

Services to football? No one has provided more service than him.

Sign this petition, but sign it while being disciplined.

rejection.details:
The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition. 

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
